flawed_nl_solution:
Being 7019 km the distance from Spain to Russia. To get from Germany to Russia, Peter has to travel 7019 - 1615 = <<7019-1615=5440>>5440 km
Knowing both distances, Peter will answer that he has to fly 5440 + 7019 = <<5440+7019=12459>>12459 km
#### 12459

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5404, not 5440. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
